PISTOL.strategy: **A Ramp Rush**: All 5 players buy armor, rush A ramp with coordinated pop-flashes. First two players clear default/triple, last three secure site and plant.
**B Apps Rush**: 4 players rush B apartments with armor and flashes. 1 player goes mid for late rotate. Apps players coordinate pop-flashes, focus on site control.
**Mid Control**: 3 players mid (1 with smoke), 2 players A ramp. Mid players smoke connector, take mid control. A players create pressure but don't commit.
**A Split**: 2 players A ramp, 3 players mid to connector. Ramp players smoke stairs, mid players smoke connector. Execute split with timing.
**Palace Control**: 3 players palace with utility, 2 players A ramp. Palace players smoke connector/jungle, take palace control. Ramp players support.
**B Default**: 2 players B apps, 2 players mid, 1 player A ramp. Play for picks and information. Mid players smoke connector if CTs push.
**Mid to B**: All 5 players go mid, smoke connector and jungle. Flash over smokes, execute B site through connector. Fast timing crucial.
**A Fake to B**: 3 players make noise A ramp with utility, 2 players position palace. Once rotations happen, all execute B through connector.
**Underpass Play**: 2 players A ramp, 2 players mid, 1 player underpass. Underpass player waits for mid contact, then flanks connector.
**Anti-Stack**: 2 players A ramp, 2 players B apps, 1 player mid. All areas create pressure simultaneously. Mid player calls rotations.

ECO.strategy: **Five-Seven A Rush**: Everyone buys Five-Seven + armor. Rush A ramp together with pop-flashes. Focus on overwhelming default player and trading kills.
**Stack B Apps**: All 5 players stack B apartments. Buy upgraded pistols + armor. Play close angles, use pop-flashes, coordinate peeks.
**Palace Lurk**: 1 player lurks palace with upgraded pistol, 4 players force buy A ramp. Palace player waits for rotations, goes for late picks.
**Deagle Mid**: 2 players buy Deagle + armor mid, 3 players support with utility. Deagles take long angles top mid. Support players trade frag.
**Connector Rush**: 4 players buy armor + upgraded pistols, rush connector from mid. 1 player saves in spawn. Use pop-flashes for close duels.
**Anti-Force A**: 3 players buy armor + Five-Seven A ramp, 2 players save. Force players smoke stairs, play for picks, then save weapons.
**B Contact**: 2 players buy armor + upgraded pistols B apps, 3 players save mid. B players go for aggressive contact with flashes.
**Mid Control**: 3 players buy armor + upgraded pistols mid, 2 players save. Mid players smoke connector, fight for picks with utility.
**Split Save**: 2 players force A ramp, 2 players force B apps, 1 player saves mid. Both sides play for picks, saver rotates to help.
**Full Save**: All players save completely. 2 A ramp, 2 B apps, 1 mid. Play for exit frags and positioning for next round.

HALF_BUY.strategy: **A Control**: 3 players buy rifles, 2 players SMGs. 2 rifles A ramp, 1 rifle mid, SMGs support. Ramp rifles smoke stairs, take site control.
**Mid Presence**: 2 rifles mid, 2 SMGs A ramp, 1 rifle B apps. Mid rifles smoke connector, take mid control. Create pressure from multiple angles.
**B Apps Take**: 2 rifles B apps, 2 SMGs mid, 1 rifle A ramp. Apps rifles clear apartments, take B control. Mid SMGs support or rotate.
**Palace Control**: 3 players mid (2 rifles, 1 SMG), 2 SMGs A ramp. Mid players smoke connector, take palace control. Decide connector or A execute.
**Pick Heavy**: Spread rifles for picks. 1 rifle A ramp, 1 rifle mid, 1 rifle B apps, 2 SMGs floating. Play for economy upgrade.
**Ramp Focus**: 4 players A ramp (2 rifles, 2 SMGs), 1 rifle mid. Ramp players smoke stairs, take A control. Mid rifle watches rotations.
**Connector Split**: 2 rifles mid, 2 SMGs A ramp, 1 rifle B apps. Execute A split through connector and ramp. Mid rifles smoke connector.
**Anti-Full Buy**: 2 rifles long angles, 3 SMGs close angles. Rifles hold mid and A ramp, SMGs play close. Use utility to isolate duels.
**Underpass Control**: 2 rifles A ramp, 2 SMGs mid (1 underpass), 1 rifle B apps. Underpass SMG waits for contact, then flanks.
**Utility Heavy**: 2 rifles, 3 SMGs with heavy utility. Rifles take key angles, SMGs use smokes/flashes to support team plays.

FULL_BUY.strategy: **A Execute**: Smoke stairs + connector, flash over smokes. 3 players A ramp, 2 players connector. Execute A site with perfect timing and utility.
**Mid Control**: 3 players mid with full utility, 2 players A ramp. Mid players smoke connector + window, take mid control. Execute based on reads.
**B Split**: 2 players B apps, 3 players mid to connector. Smoke connector + jungle, flash over smokes. Execute B split with coordination.
**Palace Take**: 4 players mid, 1 player A ramp. Mid players smoke connector + window, take palace control with flashes. Execute A through connector.
**Default Setup**: 2 A ramp, 2 mid, 1 B apps. AWPer mid, riflers A ramp. Play for picks with utility. Execute based on information gathered.
**A Fake to B**: 3 players make noise A ramp with utility, 2 players position mid. Once rotations happen, all 5 execute B through connector.
**Window Control**: 3 players mid, 2 players A ramp. Mid players smoke window, take mid control. AWPer window, riflers support with utility.
**B Apps Execute**: 4 players B apps with full utility, 1 player mid lurk. Apps players smoke balcony + site, execute B. Mid lurker watches rotations.
**Anti-Stack A**: Heavy utility on A ramp (multiple smokes + flashes), 4 players execute A site. 1 player mid watches for rotations.
**Late Round B**: Play default until 30 seconds, then all 5 execute B through connector. Use smokes + flashes for late round timing.
